alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 8:28PM MDT until July 06 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY... At 827 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Teapot Rock, which is also 30 miles north of Casper, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midwest, Edgerton and Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 209 and 232. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
